QuestData.Title: Accessories of the Cursed
QuestData.Description:
Wait! Before ye go rushin' off, we might want to be gettin more than just seaweed.
Ye see, these vrykul also be carrying bones with them - worn all over like jewelry. If ye can get yer hands on some of the bones they got lyin around, it'll add to the disguise.
So what ye waitin for?
QuestData.CompletionText: Make sure ye've got enough bones before we move on.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah yes, these will do. $B$BNow lets see what we can make to fool old Guarm, eh?
